blocks.name: cfi
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the function whose value is the class of finite intersections of the elements of a given set.
blocks.origin: const class cfi { fi }

blocks.name: diff.cfi.s
diff.cfi.c
diff.cfi.w
df-fi
blocks.content: Function whose value is the class of finite intersections of the elements of the argument. Note that the empty intersection being the universal class, hence a proper class, it cannot be an element of that class. Therefore, the function value is the class of nonempty finite intersections of elements of the argument (see ~ elfi2 ). (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.)

blocks.name: fival
blocks.content: The set of all the finite intersections of the elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm fival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  fvmptd3(hs0, cfi, c0, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), universe, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-fi(hs0, s0, s1)
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))
  rexeqdv(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))
  ineq1d(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn, cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), universe), wss(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), universe))
  abssi(s0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))
  rexlimiva(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(c0))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(c0))), wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)))
  eqsstrd(cv(s0), cuni(c0), cint(cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))), wss(cint(cv(s1)), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  elpwid(cv(s1), c0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  elinel1(cv(s1), cpw(c0), cfn)
  sylibr(wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cint(cv(s1)), universe))
  eqvisset(s0, cint(cv(s1)))
  intex(cv(s1))
  intssuni2(cv(s1), c0)
  selpw(s0, cuni(c0))
  pwexd(cuni(c0), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), cpw(cuni(c0)), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cuni(c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cpw(cuni(c0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cuni(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: elfi
blocks.content: Specific properties of an element of ` ( fi `` B ) ` . (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  sylan9bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cfi, c2), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  fival(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  elabg(hs0, c0, c1, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cint(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  rexbidv(s0, (P(c2)â‹‚ Fin), hs0 = c0, hs0 = â‹‚ s0, c0 = â‹‚ s0)

blocks.name: elfi2
blocks.content: The empty intersection need not be considered in the set of finite intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfi2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(c2, universe)))
  elex(c2, cfv(cfi, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe)))
  rexlimiva(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqeltrd(c2, universe, cint(cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  eldifsni(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), emptycls)
  intex(cv(s0))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))))
  elfi(s0, c2, universe, c0, c1)
  rexbidv2(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wa(wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))))
  pm5.32da(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))))
  biantrud(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls))))
  nsyl3(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe))
  mtbiri(wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe), wcel(universe, universe))
  vprc()
  eleq1d(cint(cv(s0)), universe, universe, wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  syl6eq(cint(cv(s0)), universe, cint(emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  inteqd(cv(s0), emptycls, wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  elsni(cv(s0), emptycls)
  int0()
  eqeltrrd(cint(cv(s0)), universe, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  simpll(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  eldif(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

} = {

  syl6eqr(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))), wceq(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))

  3anbi1i(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2, c0))

blocks.name: inelfi
blocks.content: The intersection of two sets is a finite intersection. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm inelfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: inficl

blocks.name: fiuni
blocks.content: The union of the finite intersections of a set is simply the union of the set itself. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: fipwss
blocks.content: If a set is a family of subsets of some base set, then so is its finite intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: dffi3
blocks.content: The set of finite intersections can be "constructed" inductively by iterating binary intersection ` _om ` -many times. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffi3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), cuni(cima(crdg(c2, c0), com))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, universe, crn(cmpo(s1, s2, cv(s0), cv(s0), cin(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6eqr(cfv(cfi, c0), cuni(cima(crdg(c2, c0), com)), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(c2, c0), com))), wcel(c0, c1))

  mpbir2and(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cuni(crn(cres(crdg(c2, c0), com))), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))), wss(c0, cuni(crn(cres(crdg(c2, c0), com)))), wral(hs1, cuni(crn(cres(crdg(c2, c0), com))), wral(hs2, cuni(crn(cres(crdg(c2, c0), com))), wcel(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(c2, c0), com)))))))

blocks.name: fifo
blocks.content: Describe a surjection from nonempty finite sets to finite intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fifo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cfv(cfi, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cint(cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cfv(cfi, c0)), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), crn(c2)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), crn(c2)), wfn(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wral(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe)))
  rgen(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  eldifsni(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), emptycls)
  intex(cv(s0))
  fnmpt(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cint(cv(s0)), universe, c2)
  dffn4(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cfv(cfi, c0)), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), crn(c2))), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), crn(c2)))
  eqrdv(hs0, cfv(cfi, c0), crn(c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c2)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))))
  elfi2(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  elv(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c2)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0))))))
  elrnmpt(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cint(cv(s0)))
  foeq3(cfv(cfi, c0), crn(c2), c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))
  diff.cin.s(s0, cpw(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfi, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
